con:testCase.name: Force_Funds
con:testCase.con:description:
This testcase displays the flow of FORCEFUNDS, which is a PIN Action. The balance of the accounts can be checked using the 'Read Balance'. Later the payment is created and further the action is performed.
Expected Flow: Check Balance -> Payment Create ->RFDD -> LAFU -> FORCEFUNDS Action ->RFPE ->CIPE.

</ns4:transaction> <ns4:approver> <ns3:userid>00929600010</ns3:userid> <ns3:name>Test Cust</ns3:name> <ns3:dateOfApproval>2020-07-06T07:52:33.000+02:00</ns3:dateOfApproval> </ns4:approver> <ns4:marketType>BM</ns4:marketType> <ns4:originalChannel>BES</ns4:originalChannel> <ns4:paymentAdditionalInfo> <ns3:debitValueDate>DAY0</ns3:debitValueDate> <ns3:creditValueDate>SPOT</ns3:creditValueDate> </ns4:paymentAdditionalInfo> </ns4:result> <ns4:paymentAmounts> <ns3:debitAmount currency="NOK"> <ns3:amount>15000.00</ns3:amount> </ns3:debitAmount> <ns3:creditAmount currency="NOK"> <ns3:amount>15000.00</ns3:amount> </ns3:creditAmount> <ns3:debitCounterValue currency="NOK"> <ns3:amount>15000.00</ns3:amount> </ns3:debitCounterValue> <ns3:creditCounterValue currency="NOK"> <ns3:amount>15000.00</ns3:amount> </ns3:creditCounterValue> <ns3:conversionRateInfo> <ns3:rate>1</ns3:rate> <ns3:type>NONE</ns3:type> <ns3:unitNumber>1</ns3:unitNumber> </ns3:conversionRateInfo> </ns4:paymentAmounts> <ns4:operationsArray>STOP_PAYMENT</ns4:operationsArray> <ns4:operationsArray>VIEW_PAYMENT</ns4:operationsArray> <ns4:operationsArray>PRIORITIZE_PAYMENT</ns4:operationsArray> <ns4:operationsArray>UNAPPROVE_PAYMENT</ns4:operationsArray> </ns2:paymentResult> </ns2:PaymentReadResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: update Transactions set PAYMENTSTATUS = 'LAFU' where TRANSACTIONSID = '${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}'

select TRANSACTIONSID, PAYMENTSTATUS from TRANSACTIONS where TRANSACTIONSID = '${Approve#Response#declare namespace ns3='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v1_1'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:payment-status-update:v1_1'; //ns3:PaymentApproveResponse[1]/ns3:approvalResult[1]/ns2:transactionId[1]}'

con:request.name: ForceFunds
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>PaymentClient</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinatioApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>PINSStandingOrder_V1_0Service</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>E212777</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>4201</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>01010077571</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>NO</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>123.123.123.123</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="ITR"/> <wsc:item key="Employee" value="E212777"/> <wsc:item key="SelfService" value="false"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="wer234"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentForceFundRequest> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level--> <urn:transactionInput> <urn1:transactionId>${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}</urn1:transactionId> </urn:transactionInput> </urn:PaymentForceFundRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: SELECT BUSINESSKEY, LOG_ID,BANK_ORG_ID, FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, EVENT_TYPE.SUBCATEGORY FROM EVENT_LOG INNER JOIN EVENT_TYPE ON EVENT_LOG.FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID = EVENT_TYPE.EVENT_TYPE_ID WHERE BUSINESSKEY = '${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_10'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}' order by LOG_ID asc
